Text:
Folks, would it kill you to say thank you to shipJ?

Would you be happier paying for the comics?

Thanks, shipJ, you make Wednesdays a little more bearable.

thanks you so much for your weekly uploads shipJ. Every week I scour for Sonic The hedgehog and Sonic Universe...but I have not seen isssues #228 or #32 of the aforementioned for over a month...if you no longer plan to include those series could you let me know? Thanks
